name: webimpress70/coding-standard
description: PHP 7.0 support for Webimpress Coding Standard

scripts.cs-check-7: docker run -it --rm -w /var/www -v $(pwd):/var/www php:7.0-cli php -d memory_limit=256M vendor/bin/phpcs
scripts.cs-fix-7: docker run -it --rm -w /var/www -v $(pwd):/var/www php:7.0-cli php -d memory_limit=256M vendor/bin/phpcbf
scripts.test-7: docker run -it --rm -w /var/www -v $(pwd):/var/www php:7.0-cli php -d memory_limit=256M vendor/bin/phpunit --colors=always
scripts.test-coverage-7: docker run -it --rm -w /var/www -v $(pwd):/var/www php:7.0-cli php -d memory_limit=256M vendor/binphpunit --colors=always --coverage-clover clover.xml
